Name: Myrtle Martini
Ingredients: 15 ml Giffard Crème de Myrtille liqueur
7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Review: A fruity concoction to remember should you find yourself with a bottle of crème de myrtille.
History: Created in 2003 at Cheyne Walk Brasserie & Salon, London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Myrtle Martini contains 224 calories
